title: FIT File: The Real Life of a Sports Tech Reviewer
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we talk about what it’s actually like to be a sports tech reviewer from the products we review, how we make money, our review process, as well as the darker side like getting blacklisted by companies.

We don’t quite have chapter markings yet, but I am working on them. It’s a beast of an episode, but arguably one of the most comprehensive episodes (or videos in general), that we’ve ever done.
